byline.contributor: Jason Grant reported from Middletown, and Benjamin Mueller from New York. Jack Begg contributed research.
byline.original: By JASON GRANT and BENJAMIN MUELLER

abstract: Orange County, NY, prosecutors charge Angelika Graswald with murder of her fiance Vincent Viafore; she had told police he disappeared under water when his kayak capsized during weekend trip on Hudson River near Cornwall.
lead_paragraph: Angelika Graswald, 35, told the New York State Police that Vincent Viafore, 46, had slipped under the frigid surface when his kayak capsized during a weekend excursion.

headline.main: Murder Charge for Woman Who Said Fiancé’s Kayak Capsized in Hudson River
headline.print_headline: Woman Who Said Kayak Capsized Is Accused of Killing Fiancé

snippet: Angelika Graswald, 35, told the New York State Police that Vincent Viafore, 46, had slipped under the frigid surface when his kayak capsized during a weekend excursion.
